Title: Back on Their Feet
Description:
$n, I could use your help. With their long shifts, our warriors down at the southern front of the battlefront are fighting to the point of exhaustion, and many of them have been exposed to the mantid poison.

We need more people to tend to the wounded. I've prepared some bandages with the herbs you brought me, but if you have some healing skills, those might work even better.

Please, $n, get our men back on their feet so that they can get back here to safety.
CompletionText:
With the constant mantid attacks, the men are being worked to the bone. We are undermanned on all fronts.

Your help means a lot to us, $n.
RewardText: There are several warriors that owe their lives to you. You have my deepest appreciation, $c.
